additional_notes: The image is a black and white photocopy of an envelope with handwritten notes on it. The envelope appears to be addressed to Andrew Stewart or current resident at 358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, FL 33480. The return address is Dan Street, San Francisco, CA 94111. The envelope has a postage stamp from The Sharper Image and is postmarked September 18, 2005. There are handwritten notes on the envelope indicating that it was treated as trash on 9-30-05 by Det. Krael.
